actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to permit the temporary loan, lease, or assignment of helicopters which are excess to operational and training needs of the military departments to State and local governments for use in carrying out public health and safety functions.

summary.text: Permits the temporary loan, lease, or assignment of helicopters which are excess to operational and training needs of the military departments to State and local governments for use in carrying out public health and safety functions. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 2545)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to permit the temporary loan, lease, or assignment of helicopters which are excess to operational and training needs of the military departments to State and local governments for use in carrying out public health and safety functions.
